snippet: A 22-year-old driver was killed and four bystanders wounded when officers opened fire in Miami Beach, but details about how it happened and why have not been made public.
abstract: Few details have been made public in two years since death of Raymond Herisse, 22-year-old driver who was killed when officers opened fire in Miami Beach; four bystanders were also wounded in incident caught on shaky cellphone video among large crowd gathered for final day of yearly hip-hop and rap event in South Beach.
lead_paragraph: A 22-year-old driver was killed and four bystanders wounded when officers opened fire in Miami Beach, but details about how it happened and why have not been made public.

headline.main: 2 Years After 116 Police Bullets Flew, Few Answers
headline.print_headline: 2 Years After 116 Police Bullets Flew, Few Answers
